name: james-heinrich/getid3
description: PHP script that extracts useful information from popular multimedia file formats

suggest.ext-com_dotnet: COM extension is required when loading files larger than 2GB on Windows.
suggest.ext-ctype: ctype extension is required when loading files larger than 2GB on 32-bit PHP (also on 64-bit PHP on Windows) or executing `getid3_lib::CopyTagsToComments`.
suggest.ext-dba: DBA extension is required to use the DBA database as a cache storage.
suggest.ext-exif: EXIF extension is required for graphic modules.
suggest.ext-iconv: iconv extension is required to work with different character sets (when `ext-mbstring` is not available).
suggest.ext-json: JSON extension is required to analyze Apple Quicktime videos.
suggest.ext-libxml: libxml extension is required to analyze RIFF/WAV/BWF audio files.
suggest.ext-mbstring: mbstring extension is required to work with different character sets.
suggest.ext-mysql: MySQL extension is required to use the MySQL database as a cache storage (deprecated in PHP 5.5, removed in PHP >= 7.0, use `ext-mysqli` instead).
suggest.ext-mysqli: MySQLi extension is required to use the MySQL database as a cache storage.
suggest.ext-rar: RAR extension is required for RAR archive module.
suggest.ext-SimpleXML: SimpleXML extension is required to analyze RIFF/WAV/BWF audio files (also requires `ext-libxml`).
suggest.ext-sqlite3: SQLite3 extension is required to use the SQLite3 database as a cache storage.
suggest.ext-xml: XML extension is required for graphic modules to analyze the XML metadata.
suggest.ext-zlib: Zlib extension is required for archive modules and compressed metadata.
